content: make a sweet gift with this heart flower pot crochet pattern and let someone know that you re thinking of them this is a quick and easy pattern with minimal sewing it would be perfect for valentine s anniversary or mother s day gifts and makes a fun accent piece sitting on a desk shelf or mantel the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog **materials ** * dk weight yarn * 2 5mm crochet hook * polyester fiberfill * card tissue box cereal box etc * 18 gauge floral wire * pliers * fabric glue * stitch marker yarn needle scissors the finished item measure approximately 4 10cm tall item size may vary depending on gauge and materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/amigurumi-heart-in-a-pot-pattern/
